SqlTable.SqlScriptCreate: CREATE TABLE [dbo].[CentridiCR] ( [CentridiCR_Ky] int IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL , [CentridiCR_Titolo] varchar(200) NULL , [CentridiCR_Descrizione] varchar(MAX) NULL , [Utenti_Ky] int NULL , [CentridiCR_UserInsert] int NULL , [CentridiCR_UserUpdate] int NULL , [CentridiCR_UserDelete] int NULL , [CentridiCR_DateInsert] datetime NULL , [CentridiCR_DateUpdate] datetime NULL , [CentridiCR_DateDelete] datetime NULL , [CentridiCR_Padre] int NULL , [CentridiCR_Ordine] int NULL , [CentridiCR_Attivo] bit NULL , [CentridiCR_Icona] varchar(100) NULL ) ALTER TABLE [dbo].[CentridiCR] ADD CONSTRAINT PK_CentridiCR PRIMARY KEY ([CentridiCR_Ky])
